p:
Soil erosion has generated environmental, social and economic damage worldwide
1 . Recent studies indicate that the world’s food production needs to increase by 60% to 110% to meet global demand growth
2, 3 and that soil erosion will increase in 21 st century due to climate change
4– 6 . Therefore, one of the greatest challenges of this century is to promote water and food security by efficient agricultural productivity and reduction of soil erosion
7 .
